sense.gloss: dainty, delicate, slender, slim and elegant
to be extravagant, to live luxuriously
to be proud, to be haughty

k_ele.e: おごる平家久しからず

r_ele.r: おごるへいけひさしからず

sense.gloss: pride goes before a fall, pride comes before a fall, the proud Heike family does not last long

k_ele.e: 驕る平家は久しからず
奢る平家は久しからず
おごる平家は久しからず

r_ele.r: おごるへいけはひさしからず

sense.gloss: pride goes before a fall, pride comes before a fall, the proud Heike family does not last long
x: 奢る平家久しからず・おごるへいけひさしからず

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑華奢↑↓きゃしゃ↓な↑体格↑↓たいかく↓だ。
・・・・おいおいおい、↑奢↑↓おご↓りとわかったらリミッター↑解除↑↓かいじょ↓ですか↑二人↑↓ふたり↓とも。
sdata.e: ... Hey-hey you two, is it no holds barred as soon as you know it's my treat?
Is it my turn to pay?

sdata.j: 「↑先輩↑↓せんぱい↓、お↑昼↑↓ひる↓ご↑飯↑↓はん↓、↑奢↑↓おご↓ってください！」「いつもいつも↑集↑↓たか↓るな」「いいじゃないですかぁ。↑先輩↑↓せんぱい↓、↑昨日↑↓きのう↓、バイト↑代↑↓だい↓が↑入↑↓はい↓ったんでしょ？」「↑仕方↑↓しかた↓ないな。↑何↑↓なに↓↑食↑↓た↓べに↑行↑↓い↓く？」
sdata.e: Senpai, please treat me to lunch! "You should stop forever sponging off of me." "It's alright isn't it? Didn't you get payment from your part time job yesterday?" "I guess it can't be helped. What do you want to eat?"

words.gloss: dainty, delicate, slender, slim and elegant
